bug.author: DNXie
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/ragged/constant>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/ragged/constant</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
Format issue. In the "Args" section, format of description of ragged_rank is problematic. The default value should be max(0, K-1-len(inner_shape)) <denchmark-h:h3>Parameters defined</denchmark-h>
Yes <denchmark-h:h3>Returns defined</denchmark-h>
Yes <denchmark-h:h3>Raises listed and defined</denchmark-h>
Yes

comments.comment: The issue was that in docstring crossed two lines and doc rendering doesn't work anymore. Created a PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/40057>#40057</denchmark-link> for the fix.
